entries.description: Added support for configuring the dex theme via values file.
Added vertical scroll to the install Addon dialog.
Update metering to v1.0.4 with increased namespace report generation performance and Prometheus v2.37.9.
Update operating-system-manager (OSM) to v1.3.1. (TODO: Update after OSM patch release)
Fix kube_service_labels metric scraping. The related scraping config was adapted accordingly.
VSphere: Fix a bug where datastore cluster value was not being propagated to the CSI driver.
Add missing images from envoy-agent DaemonSet in Tunneling expose strategy when running `kubermatic-installer mirror-images`.
Fix an issue in the kubermatic-installer mirror-images command, which led to failure on the mla-consul chart.
Fix an issue where IPv6 IPs were being ignored when determining the address of a user cluster.
Fix a reconcile loop for `seed-proxy-token` Secret on Kubernetes 1.27.

Fix support for keycloak OIDC logout. New field `oidc_provider` was introduced to support OIDC provider specific configurations. Configuring `oidc_provider` as `keycloak` will properly configure the logout workflow.
Fix a bug, for Community Edition, where the values configured for vSphere, Hetzner, and Nutanix nodes were not being persisted.
MLA: fix the Kubernetes overview dashboard in Grafana.
MLA: fix configuration live reload for monitoring-agent and logging-agent.
